name: Kalimba: Adventure Through Music
description:
Remark. Sorry for the resolution problem. Please play this game in a full screen.

This is a game that me and my team work on during Game Talent Showcase 2022. 

Kal is a little boy who lives in a small abandoned port town. He was abandoned by his parents and “Termis” is the one that kept and raised him with his magical kalimba. One day, Termis is sick and tells Kal to find him “the glow sapling”. To help Termis, He starts an adventure to find the sapling and also learns about this world through adventure.

  • use WASD to walk
  • use Z to interact
  • point your mouse's cursor in the direction that notes come. press Z to gain points.
